title: Low Priority Que
body: I was having some connectivity problems earlier today and was placed into low priority queue for leaver buster. Is there a way to tell how many games I have left in low priority queue?

replies.body: Hey there, your client should tell you but I checked for you just in case.  You currently have 4 of your 6 games remaining!
oh okay thank you! Where would it tell me in the client?
